Atlantis - A mystical island city hidden deep within the ocean, ruled by a council of wise and powerful beings. The city is a marvel of engineering and architecture, with towering spires and grand monuments, all carved from a single, massive crystal. The beings of Atlantis possess advanced technology and magic, allowing them to harness the power of the ocean and create a utopian society. Confidence score: 0.9
